publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3466 Ms Margo MacDonald: The Holyrood Project—That the Parliament recognises the importance of the Holyrood Project to the electorate’s confidence in the ability of the Scottish Parliament to administer policy and manage public finances and resolves to fully inform people of the circumstances which have led to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body seeking an extra £28.2 million funding in addition to the estimated project cost intimated in March 2002.
S1M-3466 The Holyrood Project (lodged on 4 October 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3466 The Holyrood Project (lodged on 4 October 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3466 The Holyrood Project (lodged on 4 October 2002) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3466 The Holyrood Project (lodged on 4 October 2002) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3466 The Holyrood Project (lodged on 4 October 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
